    Facilities

    Durham HPC Days takes place in the Mathematical Sciences and Computer Science Building page.

    ðŸ§­ Accessibility

    Please visit this page to find further details on accessibility, facilities, and connectivity across the Computer Science building.

    ðŸš¾ Toilets and Showers

    Changing Places

    A Changing Places toilet is available on Level 1, to the left as you enter via the main entrance.

    Accessible Toilets

    Accessible toilet facilities are available in several locations:

    • Level 0 â€“ rear right of the building, as you exit the rear lift
    • Level 1 â€“ within the Computer Science Reception area
    • Levels 2 & 3 â€“ rear right, along left and right central corridors, and along the front left corridors as you exit the main lift

    Left-hand transfer toilets: 2049, 2088, 3091, 3051
    Right-hand transfer toilets: 2055, 2101, 3057, 3105

    Standard Toilets

    • Female facilities: Level 0 (rear right, exit rear lift) and Levels 1â€“3 (centre, exit main lift)
    • Male facilities: Level 0 (rear right, exit rear lift) and Levels 1â€“3 (centre, exit main lift)

    Showers

    Standard shower facilities are located on Levels 1 and 2, along the centre-left corridor as you exit the main lift.

    ðŸ’§ Drinking Water

    Chilled water taps are available at the following locations:

    • Corridors beside and opposite the main reception desk on the 1st floor
    • Corridor behind the CS reception desk on the 1st floor
      (Go up the stairs to main reception, turn left, and walk back on yourself)
